content.raw: The decision to use Docker has me baffled.  We will be running on Amazon AWS EC2 servers for practice and it only takes a couple clicks to save an image there.  That image is easily loaded into a new EC2 instance.  And we're done.  There really is no need for all of us to learn to build Docker containers.
